network

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Class has essential methods that provides connection with the server (Litter Box) and it is responsible for sending and receiving messages.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.io.ObjectInputStream in 
      private boolean isConnected 
      private Message message 
      private java.io.ObjectOutputStream out 
      private java.net.Socket socket

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean closeConnection()
      Method is used for disconnecting for the server (Litter Box).
      java.lang.String connectToServer(java.lang.String msg)
      If panel is disconnected this method attempts to connect to the LitterBox (server).
      boolean isConnected()
      Checks if socket is still connected to the server (Litter Box).
      java.lang.String sendNewMessage(java.lang.String text, int header)
      Sends new message to the server (Litter Box), then waits for response and returns message for the server.

    • Method Detail

      • connectToServer

        public java.lang.String connectToServer(java.lang.String msg)
                                 throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        If panel is disconnected this method attempts to connect to the LitterBox (server).
        Parameters:
        msg - - text that you want to send.
        Returns:
        - message from the server (response message).
        Throws:
        - - UnknownHostException, IOException
        java.net.UnknownHostException
        java.io.IOException

      • sendNewMessage

        public java.lang.String sendNewMessage(java.lang.String text,
                              int header)
        Sends new message to the server (Litter Box), then waits for response and returns message for the server.
        Parameters:
        text - - text that you want to send to the server.
        header - - header that is used to recognize action on server's side. Use one of static final headers for Message class.
        Returns:
        Response (text message) for the server.

      • closeConnection

        public boolean closeConnection()
        Method is used for disconnecting for the server (Litter Box).
        Returns:
        True if disconnected without any problems. False if exception occoured.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Checks if socket is still connected to the server (Litter Box).
        Returns:
        True if socket is NOT closed. False if the socket is closed.
